LanguageData.DraeneiScenario.label: Draenei - A Personal Exodus
LanguageData.DraeneiScenario.description: After a group of draenei, who would later become the Lightforged, split off from the Genedar in their own dimensional ship, the Xenedar, you decide that you should do the same. Working together to construct a rudimentary ship the three of you say your fairwells and depart to worlds unknown.
LanguageData.DraeneiScenario.scenario.name: Draenei - A Personal Exodus
LanguageData.DraeneiScenario.scenario.summary: An offshoot of draenei civilians choose to take their own path.
LanguageData.DraeneiScenario.scenario.description: After a group of draenei, who would later become the Lightforged, split off from the Genedar in their own dimensional ship, the Xenedar, you decide that you should do the same. Working together to construct a rudimentary ship the three of you say your fairwells and depart to worlds unknown.
LanguageData.DraeneiScenario.scenario.parts.9.text: An offshoot of draenei civilians choose to take their own path.
